com.ibm.di.connector.maximo.util
Class Dom

java.lang.Object
  com.ibm.di.connector.maximo.util.Dom

public final class Dom
extends Object

This class consists exclusively of static methods that operate on or return XML content and DOM elements.

Since:
7.1
